ctx: intros n c s H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients, n : nat c : Client_index s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) H1 : event_step_star step_async step_async_init (hd s) H2 : lb_step_execution lb_step_async s H3 : weak_fairness lb_step_async label_silent s H4 : Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c Unable to unify "exists c : name, eventually (fun s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => In {| pSrc := c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s)))) ?M1639" with "eventually (fun s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s)))) s".

original: intros n c s H1 H2 H3 H4. apply eventually_Unlock; auto.
